name: Britiannia
startIntroPart1: We come for the englightment of the world
startIntroPart2: I hope you will see the light
declaringWar: I am sorry to have to do this but the future of the world takes priority
attacked: You have may have made a bad mistake
introduction: Welcome to the empire of light
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: I hope you will see the light soon
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honour of this trade offer
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
[+25]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
Will not be chosen for new games
[-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness] for every known Natural Wonder
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your Ally for [5] turns
Gain a free [Harbor] [in all coastal cities]
May choose [5] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
Allied City-States will occasionally gift Great People
[10]% Food is carried over after population increases [in all cities]
